documents.document: We will easily sell out our allocation against Rangers, so all these fans buying extra tickets in the south who can’t make it or already have a seat better be giving the tickets to someone who can fill that seat otherwise you’re stopping other fans going. Fill the place🇳🇬
@EwenDCameron Flog it on George Street in Edinburgh, the Spice Boys of Edinburgh will go daft for that felly.

@mckinnon410 @The_Tman10 Yeah maybe he could benefit with better players around him. Just when I’ve seen him I feel it’s a step backwards for us. Bottom line is I trust Lennon and would back anyone he recruited though.
@The_Tman10 @mckinnon410 Well if they are struggling to keep him and he is that good, a deal between him and Simon Murray could be done. Both teams would benefit from that.

@mckinnon410 @The_Tman10 McGeough always had the tools, always played well when he had a run of games. Has improved under Lennon, but Crawford is nowhere near as gifted. Not seen much of Kamara so can’t comment.
@mckinnon410 @The_Tman10 He’s no bad, not for me though. Step backwards.

It’s almost 24 hours later and the seethe continues. Fuckin beautiful, roll on the 13/05 🇳🇬
P.s. It’s a Sunday

@Chrispytoal Don’t think it’s the right move for him either personally. Even when Brown retires he’s not a natural replacement, totally different kind of player. He’s better going south. He’s a class player. 23 with potentially 10 years left, you can definitely still have potential to fulfil.

@Chrispytoal To be honest loaning him back wouldn’t be a bad move. When he’s at his best he’s fuckin class, but he does go missing. Not the finished article yet, but has the potential. He loves at Hibs as well. So the loan would work if it continues to develop him as a player.
